name: 劉建浩
objective: 本課程介紹作業研究中非線性模式之各項基本概念及應用，包含整數規劃、動態規劃、賽局原理、馬可夫鏈、等候原理、存貨模式、專案管理、模擬等。
schedule:
The transportation problem (Week 1-3)
Network Optimization Models (Week 4-6)
Dynamic Programming (Week 7-8)
Mid-term Test (Week 9)
Programming (Week 10)
Integer Programming (Week 11-13)
Nonlinear Programming (Week 14-16)
Decision Making (Week 17)
Final Examination (Week 18)
materials: Introduction to Operation Research (8th Edition, Hillier)
